post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hi Brendan, I hope you are having a great day today! I am wondering if you can help me.
I have an opportunity for a Junior Java J2EE Developer. This role is joining an existing team and we want a recent graduate in order to properly slot the skill set for future growth and career development. The team already has some 5+ year experienced Developers and this new role is graded lower.
The keys are a person with a recent (2005-'09) Computer Science degree, Java J2EE and PL/SQL exp., including JSP, EJB, Struts, Javascript, etc.
Brendan, who do you know that I can talk to about this? Please think of anyone who fits this profile, even if they are not looking for a job themselves -> they may have a classmate they know who would be interested!
Thank you for your consideration.
Regards,
Santosh Pande Staffing Consultant QUEUE IT Professionals 3100 Steeles Avenue East, Suite 205 Markham, Ontario Canada L3R 8T3 T. 905.754.8000 ext 341 F. 905.754.8001
spande@queue.ca
post.title: Junior Java J2EE Developer - recent graduate
